theDuelist:SummonPower.NAME: Summons
DESCRIPTIONS: The number of monsters you have currently summoned. Gain more by playing monsters. Remove summons by tributing or sacrificing.

theDuelist:JamPower.NAME: Jam Breeder
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Summon 1 and deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

theDuelist:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH
